## What's Changed
* Add `annotation_selects` tag class by @finn-ball in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3541
* Fix 'NoneType has no attribute' error when building `rust_test` using `crate` attr with `settings:experimental_per_crate_rustc_flag` set by @bmoxb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3621
* bzlmod `crate.annotation_select` generalized by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3620
* `fail(...)` if both `crate` and `crate_root` attrs are specified on `rust_test` by @bmoxb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3622
* Allow passing env files to build script runtime env by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3632
* [cargo-bazel] Cleanup MetadataGenerator usage by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3592
* [cargo-bazel] Avoid regenerating cargo lockfile when splicing is not needed by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3593
* Added Rust 1.90.0 checksums by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3624
* Migrate `rules_js` rules and tests to external module by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3630
* Use setdefault in case no other annotations exist by @patrickmscott in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3629
* rust_repository_set: Allow extra_exec_rustc_flags to be a dict by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3601
* Correct documented type of `CrateInfo.aliases` field (dict key type is `Target`, not `Label`) by @bmoxb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3598
* Remove repeated _is_proc_macro calls in collect_deps by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3633
* Microoptimize construct_lto_arguments by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3635
* Fast-path _expand_location_for_build_script_runner by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3637
* Crate Universe: `crate.spec()` supports `path` by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3596
* Avoid quadratic deduping in location expansion by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3636
* Speedup collect_deps by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3634
* Ensure the library search path from cc_toolchain is preferred over whatever rustc finds in the Windows registry by @dgrunwald-qt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3608
* rust_toolchain: expand Make variables in flags by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3640
* Various starlark cleanups under rustc_compile_action by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3643
* Improve depset construction in collect_deps by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3647
* Streamline deps handling in collect_deps by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3645
* Update the runfiles library behavior to support an empty RUNFILES_MANIFEST_FILE by @levymp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3655
* collect_inputs.files: fix docs and and add a check for `data` by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3657
* Provide RUSTDOC env var to build scripts by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3656
* Delete old bazelrc flag no longer used for testing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3649
* Added rules_rust_pyo3 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3648
* flip the _incompatible_do_not_include_data_in_compile_data check by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3658
* Release 0.66.0 by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3661

## New Contributors
* @dgrunwald-qt made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3608
* @levymp made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3655

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.65.0...0.66.0

## What's Changed
* Resolve mismatched_lifetime_syntaxes warning in cargo-bazel by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3587
* [cargo-bazel] Avoid repeatedly hitting the filesystem during CrateIndexLookup by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3589
* Various cargo-bazel performance improvements by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3588
* bindgen: Pass `-resource-dir` Clang flag to bindgen-cli. by @martinboehme in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3591
* bindgen: Strip out `-Xclang` flags that upstream Clang doesn't understand. by @martinboehme in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3606
* Add gcc-ld to rustc_lib target by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3600
* Add support for collecting a target's cfg flags into CrateInfo. by @bmoxb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3603
* Fix formatting issues by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3615
* Bump rules_cc to `0.2.4` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3535
* Added support for fetching firefox for wasm_bindgen tests on MacOS by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3597
* Handle rust_library_group dependencies in more places by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3617
* Release 0.65.0 by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3618

## New Contributors
* @timothyg-stripe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3600
* @bmoxb made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3603

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.64.0...0.65.0

## What's Changed
* feat: Add WASI Preview 2 support and enhanced target coverage by @avrabe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3507
* Fix link to example in extensions.bzl by @jemoster in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3537
* Do not use `runfiles.collect_data` by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3531
* Bump various bzlmod dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3534
* Add known shas for wasip2 target by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3539
* Add buildifier hook by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3529
* Allow setting timeout for cargo-bazel. by @sardok in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3485
* Fix typos in crate universe folder by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3516
* migrate prettier into pre-commit by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3517
* Use pre-commit github action by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3530
* Fix typos in nix and test by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3554
* rust_toolchain: support location-expansion in extra_exec_rustc_flags by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3540
* Add support for extra rustc environment variables by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3510
* Adding select statements for build script environment and data attributes in bzlmod by @finn-ball in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3511
* Add `//tools/upstream_wrapper:rustdoc` by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3561
* Add Rust 1.89.0 by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3560
* Bring strip_level configuration up to top level by @Bownairo in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3434
* Add setting `always_enable_metadata_output_groups` by @refi64 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3524
* Add setting `clippy_output_diagnostics` to match `rustc_output_[...]` by @refi64 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3528
* Flip default for `incompatible_change_clippy_error_format` to true. by @martinboehme in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3574
* Build and upload s390x-unknown-linux-gnu crate_universe binary to releases by @jonathan-albrecht-ibm in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3462
* Fix typos in rust tools and util by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3577
* Use ctx.watch properly for crate_universe by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3569
* Fix NoneType exception for interface dependencies. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3563
* Add libLLVM to coverage runfiles by @mortenmj in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3546
* Fix typos in extensions by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3578
* Add riscv64gc-unknown-linux-gnu to tier 2 targets. by @anp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3487
* Support rustdoc_flags parameter for rust_doc_test similar to rust_doc by @max-heller in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3543
* Fix document for crate_universe by @powei-lin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3550
* Support crate_features in rust_doc() and rust_doc_test() by @max-heller in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3544
* Fix bazel formatting by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3583
* Speedup manifest splicing by removing workspace discovery logic by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3570
* Improve concurrency control for cargo_tree_resolver by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3580
* Include transitive out_dirs in linking action by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3579
* Fix typos in examples by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3585
* Release 0.64.0 by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3582

## New Contributors
* @avrabe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3507

## What's Changed
* Add armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf alias for backwards compatibility by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3410
* Add basic pre commit by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3484
* Add `clippy_error_format` setting. by @martinboehme in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3496
* add allocator libraries compatible with the new rustc mangling by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3403
* update RBE workers platform to `ubuntu2204` by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3506
* Use the linkstamps from linker_inputs instead of from cc_linking_context by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3500
* rust allocator symbols: add new rustc_std_internal_symbol-s by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3501
* Add pre-commit in CI and move some check over by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3489
* Fix panic line numbers by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3492
* Fix typos in cargo folder by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3488
* Optionally write the rendering lockfile when vendored by @patrickmscott in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3523
* Add Rust 1.88.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3513
* Include repository name in splicing errors by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3478
* Fix docs links by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3477
* Pass CARGO_REGISTR* env vars through to vendor by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3520
* Re-enable disabled CI by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3514
* Make Cargo.lock overwrite optional by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3526
* Release 0.63.0 by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3525

* Provide an option to opt-out of compile_well_known_types by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3228

* Enable pipelined_compilation tests for windows by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3347
* Bump crate_universe buildifier version by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3344
* Updated crates index by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3351
* Fix temp value is freed by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3350
* Update MSRV in MODULE.bazel as well as WORKSPACE.bazel by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3353

## What's Changed
* process_wrapper: Convert non-JSON diagnostics from LLVM to JSON. by @martinboehme in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3309
* Fix monitoring input manifest/lockfile/srcs changes by @gferon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3313
* Bump llvm to 17.0.3.bcr.2 for rules_rust_bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3312
* Bump wasm-bindgen dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3174
* Implement priority support for extract_cargo_lints rule by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3316
* Support local path patching in vendor mode by @jayzhuang in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3274
* Fixed loss of data in gen_rust_project for duplicate crate ids by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3317
* Moved all integration tests to `test/integration` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3315
* rust_analyzer: Support passing a --config option to Bazel by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3254
* Added `rust_wasm_bindgen_test` rule by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3267
* Revert "Pin Bazel version to 7.4.1 (#3076)" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3077
* Add firefox linux binaries for `rust_wasm_bindgen_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3320
* cargo_toml_env_vars: rule for generating env vars from a Cargo.toml file by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2772
* Update Crates Index using rev by @taj-p in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3323
* Crate universe compile_data_glob_excludes by @yoks in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3210
* extensions/prost/private/protoc_wrapper: codegen for enums was broken by @zllak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3326
* Populate cargo env vars for crate_universe targets by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3260
* Aded docs for `rust_unpretty` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3327
* Release 0.59.0 by @taj-p in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3321

## What's Changed
* Support new `cargo::` prefixes in build script outputs. by @joell in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3211
* Fix duplicate aliases generated by cargo-bazel when metadata contains by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3215
* Disable `--incompatible_autoload_externally=` as it's unusable in Bazel8 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3214
* Update mdbook to 0.4.44 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3217
* Migrated nix example to bzlmod. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3208
* Add regression test for build.rs generated features by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3207
* Add missing bzl modules to examples by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3219
* Move buildifier to github actions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3226
* Advertise CrateInfo and DepInfo from the import macro by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3220
* Mark cargo internal extension as reproducible by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3237
* Fixed broken protoc toolchain in examples  by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3221
* Added Rust 1.84.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3225
* Add support for `CARGO_BAZEL_DEBUG=TRACE` level logging by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3238
* Remove unused code from WORKSPACE files in extensions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3222
* Reduce number of default `supported_platform_triples` for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3239
* Set $CARGO in cargo_build_scripts by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3245
* Replace uses of //tools/cpp:toolchain_utils.bzl with @rules_cc//cc:find_cc_toolchain.bzl by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3263
* only set $CARGO if toolchain.cargo is set by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3275
* Ensure crate_universe modules don't override intermediates for debugging by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3244
* Improved release notes by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3248
* Upgrade rules_cc and platforms bzlmod pins by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3265
* Fix + for semver meta by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3277
* Added expected providers to `rust_prost_library`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3276
* Silence noisy cross_rs warnings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3268
* Allow unpretty aspect to run on `rust_shared_library` targets. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3273
* Patch out old deps from transitive prost extension deps by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3264
* Fixed crate_universe when using Rust >= 1.85.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3251
* Add note about private crate registries by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3278
* Merge all runfiles of `@bazel_tools//tools/bash/runfiles` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3292
* Allow target names containing `.` for rust_test_suite macro. by @vaibhav-1207 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3298
* map system from "darwin" to "macos" when parsing triple by @christianscott in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3296
* Add 2024 edition to rustfmt tool by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3288
* feat: Create aliases for build dependencies by @bakjos in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3229
* Fix incorrect replacement field in LTO error message by @HackAttack in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3283
* Ran buildifier by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3301
* bindgen: don't `register_toolchains` in Bzlmod by @lalten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3231
* Propagate cc_library defines to clang by @nbdd0121 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3271
* Add prost and tonic deps in rust-project.json if needed for proto by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3270
* Add `build_script_link_deps` to crate annotation system. by @abezukor in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3272
* Reorganized `//tools` package by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3303
* Moved `@rules_rust//tools/runfiles` to `@rules_rust//rust/runfiles` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3294
* Add *.rmeta to rustc_lib rule by @Neo-Zhixing in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3290
* Added Rust 1.85.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3281
* fix: add NIX_LDs vars to work on NixOS by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3304
* Handle debug info packages separately when using `cc_common.link` by @yuzhy8701 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3257
* Use `--remote_download_all` when building `rust_analyzer_crate_spec`s by @martingms in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3192
* Release 0.58.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3302
* Fixed release github workflow. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3305

## What's Changed
* Added documentation for all rules_rust settings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3114
* Add test for editing patch Cargo.toml files by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3063
* Rerun repository rule if manifests changed by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3117
* Remove the unused implicit attribute `_cc_toolchains`. by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3116
* Added `codegen_units` flag for setting `Rustc` resource sets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3112
* Remove crosstool files by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3118
* Added bzlmod support to rust-analyzer tests by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3125
* Look up CARGO_BAZEL_GENERATOR_PATH correctly by @HackAttack in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2088
* Added render_config and splicing_config to create_universe bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3136
* Migrate sys example to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3130
* Updated clippy and rustfmt failure tests to use bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3131
* Cleanup bazel_env example. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3134
* Consolidated docs for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3138
* fix: add 'manual' option for `//rust/settings/lto` by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3120
* Migrate ffi examples to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3129
* Bump min tested Bazel version to 7.4.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3140
* workspace: Pay attention to members by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3102
* Ignore symlinks in workspace discovery by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3142
* Warn less by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3145
* Updated crates_vendor rule to accurately use runfiles by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3146
* Consolidate example packages by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3144
* Remove rules_foreign_cc example by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3151
* Bump llvm-project module to include upstreamed patch by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3149
* Make lto toolchain options public and don't link proc-macros with LTO by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3147
* Update hello_comp_opt example with new LTO settings by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3155
* Replace symlinks in the output of cargo build scripts by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3067
* Updated crate_universe bzlmod to support skipping splicing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3148
* Fixed crate_universe examples not vendoring consistent crate versions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3169
* feat: Add `rust_lint_group` and `cargo_lints` rule to define lint groups by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2993
* Generate docs from source. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3152
* Migrated Android example to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3133
* Added `cargo_manifest_dir` submodule to `cargo_build_script_runner`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3161
* Marked various extensions as reproducible to reduce bzlmod lock size by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3164
* Added missing modules to various workspaces by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3175
* Pin non-bzlmod tests to Bazel 7 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3173
* Run `bazel mod tidy` after vendoring crate_universe outputs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3177
* Add support for UEFI targets and OS by @lorenz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2142
* Add documentation about using binary dependencies in crate_universe by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3183
* Improve handling of compile_data with mixed sources by @martingms in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3176
* Updated crate_universe depednencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3182
* Add objective-c and java to clang-format by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3154
* Delete rules_nodejs rules from wasm_bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3153
* Migrated iOS examples to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3132
* Fix toolchain repo aliases and add a test. by @sputt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3181
* Added Rust 1.84.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3179
* Don't register rust_host_tools twice by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3188
* Release 0.57.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3165
* Fix crate_universe release action for MacOS by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3190

## What's Changed
* Added `out_name` attribute to `rust_wasm_bindgen`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3086
* Use rules_shell instead of built-in rules by @jwnimmer-tri in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3096
* Forward clippy, rustfmt, and rust-analyzer through wasm_bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3094
* Added bzlmod support to `test/no_std` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3091
* Use `abs` from utils instead of the global by @avdv in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3075
* Added global setting for `cargo_build_script.use_default_shell_env` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3065
* Remove unnecessary external dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3088
* Added `rust_prost_transform` rule for modifying granular proto_library by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3083
* Ignore .bazel symlinks as well as bazel- symlinks by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3103
* Added `rules_mdbook` to extension modules. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3105
* Support repository_set from bzlmod by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3106
* Updated rules_rust_mdbook docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3108
* Added support for capturing snippets from wasm-bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3087
* Revert "rust_analyzer: don't build a tree of RustAnalyzerInfos (#3028)" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3093
* feat: Add `//rust/settings:lto` by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3104
* Do not cache rustc info in deps resolver by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3107

* Allow rust_wasm_bindgen rules to re-expose rust-analyzer providers by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3035

* Regenerated crate_universe outputs. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3043

* Improve workspace discovery logic by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3030
* Bumped various crate_universe dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3046

* crate_universe Release 0.16.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3047

## What's Changed

* Make toolchain vars available but don't automatically set them by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2969
* Bring back splicing_config for crate_universe module extension by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2971
* feat: add an attr to rust_binary for customization of the binary name by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2970
* Add aliases attribute to rust tag class. by @sputt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2975
* Made `cargo_build_script` `streams` output group optional. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2976
* A rust_test_suite(srcs=[]) should be empty. by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2966
* Remove dependency on spectral by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2964
* Remove tera optional features by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2984
* Fix annotations' crate.select for lists by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2981
* Stop using config.string(allow_multiple = True) by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2983
* Remove duplication of rustc_flags introduced in 4e593b6cc3e1dab by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2987
* Added utility library for parsing workspace status stamps. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2982
* Added `cargo_config` attribute to `cargo_bootstrap_repository`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2986
* Release 0.54.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2979

* Update bindgen version to 0.70.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2872
* Fix runfiles creation for directory based runfiles. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2883
* crate_universe release 0.15.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2880
* Update `cargo_build_script` to work without runfiles support. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2871
* Revert "Update `cargo_build_script` to work without runfiles support (#2871)" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2885
* Fix keyword handling in prost wrapper by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2888
* Improved various tests to be more compatible on Windows by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2886

## What's Changed
* Delete `incompatible_no_rustc_sysroot_env` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2790
* Use `target_flag_value` instead of `target_triple.str` by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2793
* Ensure proto compiler attribute is consistent in prost_toolchain by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2794
* Remove deprecated variables from `repositories.bzl` macros by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2795
* Restored bzlmod documentation.  by @marvin-hansen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2798
* Build `rust_test` targets using a crate name different from the underlying lib by @felipeamp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2803
* Update Prost (proto) dependencies to latest versions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2810
* Added `env_inherit` attribute to `rust_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2809
* Revert "Build rust_test targets using a crate name different from the underlying lib" by @felipeamp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2815
* Use `crate_name` to also match `crate_root`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2824
* Moved `cargo_dep_env` into it's own file. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2823
* Doc: update outdated parameter `output_diagnostics` by @LiXuanqi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2813
* Update min bazel version by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2812
* Flip `experimental_use_coverage_metadata_files` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2830
* Consistently thread extra target constraints around by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2829
* Updated docs to use mdbook by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2834
* Add s390x arch support by @Repana-Chowdappa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2616
* rustdoc_test: Apply prefix stripping to proc_macro dependencies. by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1952
* Minor improvements to documentation. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2846
* Updated fetch_shas utility to use the channel manifest tomls by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2840
* Support emitting debug logs in rules_rust process wrapper. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2845
* Prune `known_shas.bzl` to only include versions used in BazelCI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2850
* Avoid double building `cargo_build_script.data` targets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2826
* Use fake.rs not /dev/null as fake source file by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2851
* Moved crate_universe `TreeResolver` into it's own file. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2852
